mapper.select: select nc.name_en, nc.name_cn, fn.content, fn.status from nutritional_components nc inner join food_nut fn on nc.id = fn.nut_id where fn.food_id = #{id}

select id, food_name, picture FROM foods where id in (select food_id FROM food_type where type_id in (select id from foodtypes where type LIKE concat('%',#{keyword},'%'))) or food_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') limit 8
